name: A2A AI Agent POC
description: Agent2Agent Protocol compliant AI agent with Gemini 2.5 Flash API capabilities for text summarization, sentiment analysis, and data extraction. Requires Bearer token authentication.

skills.name: Text Summarization
skills.description: I can summarize long documents, articles, reports, and any text content into concise overviews. Simply ask me to 'summarize' or 'give an overview' and optionally specify a length (e.g., 'in 50 words'). Powered by Google Gemini 2.5 Flash for high-quality natural language understanding.
examples: Give me a brief overview of this document in 100 words
What are the key points in this report?
Condense this text into a few sentences
Summarize the main ideas in 50 words or less

skills.name: Sentiment Analysis
skills.description: I can analyze the emotional tone and sentiment of text content, identifying whether it's positive, negative, or neutral. I provide confidence scores and detailed sentiment breakdowns to help you understand how people feel about topics, products, or services. Perfect for analyzing customer feedback, reviews, social media posts, and survey responses.
examples: What's the sentiment of this review?
Analyze the tone of this customer feedback
Is this message positive or negative?
How do people feel about this product?
Determine the emotional tone of this text
Analyze sentiment: 'This product exceeded my expectations!'

skills.name: Entity Extraction
skills.description: I can identify and extract key entities from text including people, organizations, locations, dates, events, phone numbers, and email addresses. Useful for processing documents, emails, meeting notes, and extracting structured information from unstructured text. I use advanced AI with regex fallback to ensure reliable extraction even from complex formats.
examples: Extract all the names from this document
Find all contact details in this email
Identify people and places mentioned in this text
Pull out dates and events from this message
Extract entities: 'John Smith from Microsoft spoke in Seattle on May 15th. Contact: john@microsoft.com'

bearerAuth.description: Bearer token authentication - API key required for all requests
